Name: maximize_total_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all selected User Stories to deliver the highest business value.

Name: minimize_total_effort
Description: Minimize the sum of story points for all selected User Stories to achieve goals with the least amount of work.

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of Features that reach a 'done' status within the planning period.

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the overall project timeline by optimizing the completion date of the final milestone.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Maximize the value delivered to key stakeholders by prioritizing features that are most relevant to them.

Name: minimize_number_of_open_blockers
Description: Minimize the count of active Blockers with a status other than 'resolved' at the end of a sprint.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the number of Sprints where the primary Sprint Goal is successfully achieved.

Name: minimize_budget_consumption
Description: Minimize the total budget consumed by the project to ensure cost-efficiency.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the overall team satisfaction as recorded in the Sprint Retrospectives.

Name: minimize_task_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the difference between estimated and actual effort for Tasks to improve future estimations.

Name: maximize_epic_coverage
Description: Maximize the number of Epics that are started or completed within a release plan.

Name: minimize_severity_of_blockers
Description: Minimize the impact of impediments by prioritizing the resolution of Blockers with the highest severity.
